description: Admin analytics dashboard at /admin/analytics should remain custom. Analytics involves complex aggregations, statistical calculations, chart data transformations, and domain-specific metrics (token usage trends, document completion rates, user growth curves). These are NOT simple CRUD operations - they require specialized GraphQL aggregation queries, data processing, and visualization logic. Keep existing custom implementation with optimized aggregation queries and chart components.
title: Keep Custom Implementation for Analytics Dashboard
